# Appendix C: R Functions Reference {#sec-appendix-c .unnumbered}

## Coming Soon

This appendix will provide a comprehensive guide to R functions used in this course:

- Matrix operations: `matrix()`, `t()`, `%*%`, `solve()`
- Linear models: `lm()`, `anova()`, `coef()`, `residuals()`
- Matrix properties: `qr()$rank`, `det()`, `eigen()`
- Generalized inverse: `ginv()` (MASS package)
- Contrasts: `emmeans`, `multcomp` packages
- Diagnostics: `plot()`, `hatvalues()`, `cooks.distance()`
- And more...

Each function will include syntax, examples, and livestock applications.
